attributes.action: Stop BT from Bullying its Quarterly Account Customers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
From 1st May 2007 BT intend charging its quarterly account customers an extra 1pound 50pence per month or 4pounds 50pence per quarter to pay their bills.
This despite some always having paid quarterly bills on time in the past.
To avoid the charge a monthly payment plan or direct debit MUST be taken out instead by customers.
This is akin to legalised bullying by a multi national of its customer base.
